snippet: The Richard Alston Dance Company’s performance at Montclair State University showcases its founder’s superb skills in choreography.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews dance pieces, including premiere of Richard Alston work A Ceremony of Carols, performed by Richard Alston Dance Company at Alexander Kasser Theater of Montclair State University.
lead_paragraph: The Richard Alston Dance Company’s performance at Montclair State University showcases its founder’s superb skills in choreography.

headline.seo: Richard Alston Dance at Peak Performances in Montclair
headline.main: Breathtaking Feats of Footwork From a Master Choreographer
headline.print_headline: Breathtaking Feats of Footwork From a Master Choreographer
